file_content.text: Area is secure! Get the tech team, shut down the self-destruct!
Blast you--all of you, get off my bridge!
Is this some great victory to you? Using a fleet to capture one ship?
You will give us access to the Foundry, and that could change everything.
One ship will bring victory.
If it does, it won't be with our help.
You were going to a space station--the Foundry. I want to know its secrets.
Tell me of your destination.
You really don't understand us.
I'm not telling you anything, and I'm not begging for the lives of my crew. I know about the massacres of the last war.
All boarding parties report success. Should we begin executions?
You, soldier. Make her silent.
Someone shut this woman up.
On it.
What about the rest of the crew? Should I tell the boarding parties to begin executions?
Yes. All our enemies must die.
Show no mercy. Let all who oppose the Empire know fear.
Kill them all. Fear will ensure the Empire's strength.
No point developing a reputation for mercy. Make a clean sweep, please.
They fought and they lost. No point keeping them alive.
Acknowledged.
Bloody work, but necessary. When the operation is complete, we'll broadcast the names and faces of the dead as a warning to the galaxy.
No. We don't kill for fun.
The enemy fought well, and they have earned our respect. Understood?
Murder serves no purpose here; tell the men to treat the captives fairly.
We are not savages. We are Imperials, and when we take lives, we do so for a cause. Understood?
So long as I'm in charge, we don't murder our captives.
I'll call for a prisoner transport.
Success on all fronts. We'll march the prisoners through Kaas City, and show them the Empire's glory; in turn, they will tell the galaxy.
More importantly, the cruiser is ours. Preparing it for the assault on the Foundry and its Jedi Master now.
Any more information on the enemy defenses?
What are we getting into?
We're pulling that data from the cruiser computers.
Our mission is complete.
I'm feeling impatient, Moff.
We need to make a few repairs and get a crew in place, but we'll be ready shortly.
In the meantime, I offer congratulations and suggest you return to the flagship. Darth Malgus wants to speak to his strike force.
You'll never take us alive.
